name: Mr. Men & Little Miss: Adventures in Dillydale
summary: The Mister Men, Little Miss Adventures for V Tech's MobiGo Touch Learning System utilise kid's favourite play patterns and infuse them with learning curriculum. Dance to the rhythms of DJ Mr. Messy, help Mr. Bump show off his dancing skills in the Pogo Stick Polka, or help Little Miss Sunshine get out of trouble by learning letters, numbers, colours and more and all with the touch of a finger.
